about_the_game:
This Soundtrack contains the original soundtrack by Sandy Corzeta and Dicky Teja Pratama from Vibetronic. Provided as FLACs and high-quality MP3 files.

Tracklist:
  • 1. Opening
  • 2. Character Select
  • 3. Stage 1
  • 4. Boss
  • 5. Stage 2
  • 6. Stage 3
  • 7. Stage 4
  • 8. Stage 5
  • 9. Final Boss
  • 10. Credit Roll
  • 11. Score Attack
  • 12. Light
  • 13. Worry
  • 14. Rival
  • 15. End
  • 16. Stage Clear
